up.command: ts-node -P tsconfig.app.json -r tsconfig-paths/register -r dotenv/config src/migrate.ts up

down.command: ts-node -P tsconfig.app.json -r tsconfig-paths/register -r dotenv/config src/migrate.ts down

latest.command: ts-node -P tsconfig.app.json -r tsconfig-paths/register -r dotenv/config src/migrate.ts latest

rollback.command: ts-node -P tsconfig.app.json -r tsconfig-paths/register -r dotenv/config src/migrate.ts rollback

list.command: ts-node -P tsconfig.app.json -r tsconfig-paths/register -r dotenv/config src/migrate.ts list

make.command: ts-node -P tsconfig.app.json -r tsconfig-paths/register -r dotenv/config src/migrate.ts make {args.name}

status.command: ts-node -P tsconfig.app.json -r tsconfig-paths/register -r dotenv/config src/migrate.ts status

currentVersion.command: ts-node -P tsconfig.app.json -r tsconfig-paths/register -r dotenv/config src/migrate.ts currentVersion
